page.title: 10FARMING
page.content: MIXED Farms in the area are mixed; they are composed of beef and dairy cattle, sheep, arable land and pigs, some also have poultry. No farms use more than one quarter for arable, including potatoes, on account of the weather and good prices for beef. SINGLE SUBJECT There are 3 farms with cattle only, one of them has dairy cattle only, the other two have beef as well.There are 3 pig farms, 2 are in 31 44 and the other in 30 44.The cattle farms are in 30 45, and 2 are in 30 47. 3 farms are devoted to poultry,They are in 31 44. HORTICULTURE There is a 3-acre holding in 29 44 on the A584, a 2-acre nursery and shop in 30 46,a 2-acre nursery and shop in 30 46. In 31 44 there are two nurseries.
